alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 6:37PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN GADSDEN...NORTHERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN LEON...SOUTHERN GRADY...WEST CENTRAL LOWNDES...THOMAS AND BROOKS COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EST... At 637 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Tallahassee, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Thomasville, Quincy, Havana, Quitman, Boston, Pavo, Doak Campbell Stadium, Barwick, Alma, Dillon, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Everett, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, and Miccosukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
